Oakland.Etcheverry Hall: Etcheverry Hall is a building on the UC Berkeley campus, part of the UC Berkeley College of Engineering, named after Denise Etcheverry, its main benefactor, daughter of Martial Etcheverry, California business mogul and philanthropist. Etcheverry Hall at University of California Berkeley. Built in 1964, it is located on the north side of Hearst Avenue, across the street from the main campus.
